greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Maximum number of sides in any cell in a regular n-gon with all diagonals drawn (cf. A007678).
comment: Theorem: a(2*n+1) = 2*n+1. For the proof see A342222.
It would be nice to have a bigger b-file.
link: Scott R. Shannon, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..140
results.author: _Scott R. Shannon_ and _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 06 2021
